DOC.brief_title: The Effects Formula Diet Body Weight , Body Composition , Biomarkers Disease Compared Standard Diet
DOC.detailed_description: In recent decade , prevalence overweight obesity increase dramatically developed country . Obesity associate disease diabetes , cardiovascular disease , hypertension , certain cancer . Modest amount weight loss ( e.g. , 5 % 10 % initial body weight ) significantly improve health improve disease status . Recent evidence suggest use supplement meal replacement promote great weight loss isocaloric food-based diet . In addition , diet high protein associate great rating satiety reduce food intake , well great weight loss , compare low protein diet . The purpose propose study test effect partial supplement diet body weight , body composition , biomarkers disease compare isocaloric diet consist traditional food-based meal plan . Overweight obese ( BMI 25 35 ) participant participate six-month study . The primary outcome variable body weight loss secondary outcome variable include body composition , blood pressure , lipid , subjective rating satiety .
